== Bio ==
Millnert is presently chairperson of the SNIC board. He was previously
Director General for the Swedish Research Council and Vice Chancellor
(Rektor) of Linköping University. He has also been the chairperson of
SUNET.

He holds a position as professor in Control Engineering at Linköping
University. Millnert has a Master’s degree in Engineering (Engineering
Physics and Electronics), 1977 and a Ph.D. in Control Engineering, both
from Linköping University, 1982.
